name: Camperoni
description: Camperoni automates the administrative grunt work of parenting. The platform helps parents discover kids' camps and activities, find the ones that fit their family's needs, share and coordinate with kids' friends, and register easily and on time.
one_liner: Camperoni automates the administrative grunt work of parenting. The platform helps parents discover kids' camps and activities, find the ones that fit their family's needs, share and coordinate with kids' friends, and register easily and on time.
